text: Anyone know of an example of connecting to the HubSpot API from a HubSpot js file client side? I built one with Node.js but need to add this to a module on HubSpot.

<@UFHQCMR8X> I am not sure if this is completely possible in a module on HubSpot because you usually need API key which would be exposed, most scripts are done locally with node.js which uses all the API options for manipulating data to some degree
